citations.narrative:
Four adult Boxers (#5500, #3332, #7015, #4796) in an outdoor enclosure did not have access to potable water. The water
bowl contained water but it was frozen. Failure to provide continuous access to potable water may lead to dehydration or
discomfort to the animals. The licensee provided water to the animals during the inspection. Potable water must be
continuously available to dogs. Correct by ensuring that potable water is continuously available to all dogs at all times.
Correct by 18-DEC-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
Four adult Boxers (#5500, #3332, #7015, #4796) in an outdoor enclosure did not have access to potable water. The water 
bowl contained water but it was frozen. Failure to provide continuous access to potable water may lead to dehydration or 
discomfort to the animals. The licensee provided water to the animals during the inspection. Potable water must be 
continuously available to dogs. Correct by ensuring that potable water is continuously available to all dogs at all times. 
Correct by 18-DEC-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee. 
 
 n
